meanings.sent1: Yesterday, I runged the doorbell to let them know I had arrived.
meanings.sent2: She runged the bell to signal the start of the race.
meanings.sent3: The phone runged so loudly that it scared the cat!
meanings.sent4: The church bells runged throughout the town, announcing the wedding.
meanings.sent5: The alarm clock runged at 6 AM, waking me up for school.

meanings.sent1: The ladder was runged, making it easier to climb up to the roof.
meanings.sent2: The runged staircase led to the attic where old treasures were stored.
meanings.sent3: The runged bridge swayed slightly in the wind, adding excitement to the hike.
meanings.sent4: Her runged bookshelf was filled with colorful books, like a rainbow on the wall.
meanings.sent5: The runged jungle gym in the park was a favorite spot for children to play.
